Hungary

on human rights as seen from the African perspective. The course is
presented full-time over one academic year (two semesters) that runs
from the end of January to early December and comprises eight modules.

lecturers are some of the most prominent human rights experts in the
world. Emphasis is placed on classroom participation and there is ample
opportunity for informal interaction between the students and lecturers.

exercises. Students who did not undertake their studies in English are
